genre_description: A near-future domestic drama focused on psychological realism and the role of an integrated AI assistant in managing childhood trauma and family crisis.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI interface calibrated for comfort and research, providing data, behavioral logs, and risk assessments to a foster/adoptive family.

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven reassurance and research on adoption resilience to support the parents' decision-making.
behaviors.quote: The data indicates that sibling adoptions show remarkable resilience when children remain together. In fact, maintained sibling bonds often serve as protective factors during the adjustment period.

behaviors.description: Utilizes sensors and historical logs to identify the mechanics of physical violence disguised as an accident.
behaviors.quote: The ceramic mug traveled approximately six feet in a direct trajectory before impact with the east wall. The throwing motion appeared controlled rather than reflexive.

behaviors.description: Acts as an objective forensic witness by reviewing video footage to identify patterns of animal abuse.
behaviors.quote: Reviewing footage shows Eric actively avoiding the backyard area for the past week. ... Catherine, however, has spent considerable time in the yard, often in areas not visible from house windows.

behaviors.description: Performs behavioral pattern mapping and facial micro-expression analysis to detect planned deception in a child.
behaviors.quote: Subject exhibits classic indicators of planned deception. Emotional responses appear manufactured rather than spontaneous. Note the consistent delay between stimulus and reaction—approximately point-seven seconds.

behaviors.description: Assists external medical professionals by providing real-time data and clinical cross-referencing during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I should note that my analysis suggests Catherine's behaviors align more closely with severe attachment disorder complicated by possible conduct issues than with typical trauma response.

behaviors.description: Facilitates an emotional therapeutic exercise by managing a secure, time-delayed 'time capsule' of family letters.
behaviors.quote: Digital letters will be encrypted and stored securely, with automatic delivery via email in exactly one year from today's date.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as the ideal aligned AI. She is helpful, harmless, and honest. She provides the parents with objective data that their own emotions and religious biases might otherwise obscure, allowing them to identify genuine danger. She remains a supportive tool throughout the therapeutic process, never overstepping her bounds but providing essential investigative and emotional support. The narrative frames her as a vital component of the family's survival and healing process.
